page.title: 05FARMING AT STOKE ON TERN
page.content: equipment. He does not have any livestock. He grows a variety of crops. He grows peas which he burns off when they are ready for harvesting, then they are combined and sold to the animal welfare. When he does the potato harvesting he uses conveyor belts. All the good potatoes are packed and sent off to the factory which cleans and packs them in bags for Supermarkets. He sells his bad potatoes to the animal welfare. He grows two kinds of barley: Spring which is planted in the Spring, and Winter barley which is planted in late Autumn. Also he grows wheat. The grain is harvested and stored (dried if necessary), then sold when the price is right. Another crop he grows is oil seed rape. To help get the best from his crops special irrigators are used.These are governed by computers.
